// src/ThirdStep.js import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import Stepper from '../components/Stepper'; import { FormContext } from '../context/FormContext'; import '../styles/ThirdStep.css'; function ThirdStep() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { state } = useLocation(); const { formData, updateFormData } = useContext(FormContext); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; updateFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handlePhoneChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; const [type, field] = name.split('.'); updateFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [type]: { ...prevData[type], [field]: value }, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); navigate('/fourth-step', { state: { formData } }); }; return (
